sect2.title: Command Explanations
sect2.para: --libexecdir=$(pkg-config --variable=prefix ORBit-2.0)/lib/gnome-control-center: This parameter causes the libexec files to be installed in the preferred location of $GNOME_PREFIX/lib/gnome-control-center instead of $GNOME_PREFIX/libexec.
--enable-aboutme: Enables building the gnome-about-me capplet. Evolution Data Server must be installed to use this parameter.

sect3.title: Configuration Information
sect3.para: If HAL was linked into the build and GNOME is being installed in any location other than /usr, you should create a local D-Bus session configuration file so that the installed org.gnome.SettingsDaemon.service file can be discovered by D-Bus. You should reference the information on the D-Bus page for instructions on how to create a . You may disregard this if you already created the local D-Bus session configuration file during the GNOME VFS installation.
